DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : CHARITY : THRIFT SHOP FOR AIDS GROUP TO OPEN
DOC.TEXT: Thrift shoppers in the Fairfax District will have a new place to visit next week : The Out of the Closet Thrift Store will open its doors on Tuesday with a ribbon-cutting ceremony . Like its sister store in Atwater Village , all proceeds go_to the AIDS Healthcare Foundation , the largest provider of HIV medical_care in California . Merchandise will range from run-of-the-mill , secondhand items to boutique-style goods . Keith Malone , spokesman for AIDS Healthcare Foundation , said thrift stores have been good fund-raising sources , generating roughly $ 100 # 000 a year . " We have had a lot of success with the Atwater store and now we ' re happy to provide services for Westside shoppers. "
